## Skeleton.(constructor)

Create a skeleton instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(joints: SceneNode[], inverseBindMatrices: Matrix4x4[], bindPoseMatrices: Matrix4x4[], jointTransforms?: {
        scale: Vector3;
        rotation: Quaternion;
        position: Vector3;
    }[]);
```
